meta.title: Cigarrynos – The Ultimate Cigar Companion
meta.description: The all-in-one app for cigar enthusiasts to discover, review, and share their passion

ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.message: You must be 21 years or older to enter this site.

header.description: Whether you're a casual smoker, a seasoned aficionado, or a certified expert, Cigarrynos offers the tools and community to elevate your cigar experience.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.subtitle: Tools designed to help you discover, track, and share your cigar passion

freeAccess.title: Free Access
freeAccess.description: Browse the entire cigar database with detailed specifications, search and filter by brand, country, strength, and price—no account required.

premiumAccess.title: Premium Subscription
premiumAccess.description: Manage your personal humidor, wishlist, and favorites. Track collection value and export PDF reports.

expertAccess.title: Expert Tools
expertAccess.description: Help maintain database quality by approving new entries, merging duplicates, and contributing your expertise—invite only.

socialFeatures.title: Social & Community
socialFeatures.description: Follow other enthusiasts, share reviews with detailed tasting notes, and exchange recommendations with the global community.

privacyFeatures.title: Privacy-First Design
privacyFeatures.description: Your data is yours. GDPR compliant with secure authentication, full data export options, and complete control over your information.

features.title: Experience Cigarrynos
features.subtitle: Discover the features that make your cigar journey unforgettable

feature1.title: Personal Dashboard
feature1.description: Track your cigar journey with personalized insights including top-rated cigars, recent activities, and social connections. Get a complete overview of your collection value and tasting history at a glance.

feature2.title: Collection Management
feature2.description: Organize your personal humidor, wishlist, and favorites with detailed inventory tracking. Monitor your collection's estimated value and manage multiple lists to perfectly curate your cigar experience.

feature3.title: Advanced Reviews & Aroma Radar
feature3.description: Create detailed reviews with our unique Aroma Radar to capture flavor profiles across multiple categories. Share your tasting notes and discover community ratings to find your next perfect smoke.

feature4.title: Social Community
feature4.description: Connect with fellow enthusiasts, follow other collectors, and share your cigar journey. Exchange recommendations, comment on reviews, and build your network within the global cigar community.

feature5.title: Personalized Experience
feature5.description: Customize your app with multiple themes, language support, and local currency settings. Enjoy a tailored experience that adapts to your preferences with full offline access to your data.

discover.title: Experience Cigarrynos
discover.subtitle: Explore the features that make your cigar journey unforgettable

download.title: Download Cigarrynos Today
download.subtitle: Explore the world of cigars, read expert reviews, and unlock powerful collection tools with a premium subscription. Available on iOS and Android. Internet connection required.

restriction.mainDescription: Access to this website and application is restricted to individuals who are of legal age to purchase and consume tobacco products in their jurisdiction of residence.

importantInfo.title: Important Information
items: You must be at least 21 years old to access this website and use the Cigarrynos application.
By accessing this website or using the application, you confirm that you are of legal age in your jurisdiction.
We maintain strict age verification procedures to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.intro: In accordance with international regulations and local laws governing tobacco-related products and services:
items: Age verification is mandatory for all users.
False declarations regarding age may result in account termination.
Users must comply with all applicable local laws and regulations regarding tobacco products.

restriction.warning: If you are under the legal age, please exit this website immediately.
